mapper.select: SELECT import_statement_id as importStatementId, import_datetime as importDateTime, link_user_email as linkUserEmail, link_account_number as linkAccountNumber, md5, status FROM import_statement
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO import_statement (import_datetime, link_user_email, link_account_number, md5, status) VALUES (#{importDateTime}, #{linkUserEmail}, #{linkAccountNumber}, #{md5}, #{status.statusCode})
